divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the back deck having a smoke and noticing lights moving north. Ithought it was a satellite until it zigzagged. and there wasnt a sound at all. I have been noticing these events for almost 2 weeks.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Woodstock
There were no other sightings in Woodstock on or around July 28th 2003
